IT involved. SharePoint is a great bridge for that,'' said Steve Ballmer in an interview with InformationWeek. When asked what SharePoint brings to the table that other Web development platforms don't, Steve Ballmer responded Well, you can do anything with anything. The question is, how much work is it? What we're trying to do is essentially give the people who build these sites a higher-level set of tools, so they're not reinventing the wheel. Can we provide infrastructure that ties in and lets the end user participate, and is done in a very high-quality, finished way for those folks? And we think the answer is yes. Steve Ballmer 's keynote also discussed Microsoft's commitment to SharePoint in the cloud. The company already has more than one million users signed up for SharePoint Online, a hosted version of the software. SharePoint Online

It's an unhinged one,'' said Jim Cantiello about the entertaining, unpredictable shenanigans pulled out by Steven Tyler in the first two nights of audition episodes this week. Truth be told, I never realized how much I missed Paula[ Abdul] last year. Steven Tyler 's colorful language, zany metaphors and deafening jangly man-jewelry was just the entertaining wild card the two-night premiere needed to give it a must-see facelift. `` very preliminary,'' offered three details. The first is that Apple is developing accessories that could enable new iPads and iPhones to communicate using NFC( near-field communications) technology. iLounge reported: In the most basic implementation, an accessory could announce its presence and potential functions to an iPad or iPhone without the need for a Bluetooth or similar connection; our source suggests that an otherwise simple case could include a radio chip so that an inserted iPhone or iPad could go into power-saving hibernation mode automatically. More complex accessories will go far beyond that.
